## User Story
As a **user**,
I need **some functionality**,
so that **I can achieve a goal**.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Given ...
- [ ] When ...
- [ ] Then ...

## Priority
- High / Medium / Low

## Notes
Additional details if needed.
